items.title: Enjin Coin - Lead Unity and C# Developer
items.content:
Enjin Coin - Lead Unity and C# Developer - Jobmote

Enjin Coin - Lead Unity and C# Developer

Enjin Pte Ltd

Interested in game development and cryptocurrencies? Enjin Coin (ENJ) is looking for an experienced Unity developer to join us in developing our cutting-edge framework for crypto-based game assets on the Ethereum blockchain.

Your responsibilities will include:

  • Developing a Unity Plugin that integrates with multiple item/inventory system plugins
  • Writing a clean SDK for game developers
  • Writing JSON-RPC requests to communicate with an API
  • Creating a logical interface for game developers to use inside Unity
  • Writing a base C# SDK with similar functionality

Requirements

  • Excellent knowledge of the Unity Engine
  • Experience developing plugins for Unity
  • Knowledge of item/inventory systems in Unity
  • 5+ years programming experience
  • 1+ year C# experience
  • Great written and spoken English
  • Strong understanding of object-oriented programming
  • Familiarity with design patterns
  • Good at writing clean, readable, and easily maintainable code
  • Experience writing unit tests

This is a remote full-time position, so you have to be self-motivated and put in consistent development and daily progress. Minimum commitment of 35-40 hours per week.

items.title: Full Time: Senior Software Engineer for Digital Health Startup at BrainCheck in Houston, TX (remote considered)
items.content:
Company & position overview
BrainCheck is an innovative cognitive health technology company co-founded by neuroscientists Dr. David Eagleman and Dr. Yael Katz. The company recently completed its post-seed fundraising and has market traction with schools and athletic teams, physicians offices, and hospitals. The startup team is operating out of Texas Medical Centerâ€™s Innovation Center (TMCX+) in Houston.

As we scale our user-adoption and build out exciting new features in the application, we are looking for an experienced engineer to join the team and help drive product innovation. The ideal candidate is a problem-solver who can respond quickly to changing business needs. If this sounds like you and youâ€™re excited to solve big challenges at the cutting edge of healthcare, then reach out and letâ€™s talk.

Key responsibilities:
*Feature development and maintenance for codebases in Ruby on Rails, Unity, and Ember.
*Maintenance of the automated testing and deployment systems (Jenkins and Travis).
*BrainCheck app deployment and management on AWS.
*Integrating partner apps, such as health monitoring and EMR platforms, with BrainCheck systems.
*Comfort in a fast-paced startup environment a must

Required skills include:
*5+ years of experience working as a software developer
*Working knowledge of modern front-end development and javascript proficiency
*Test driven development procedures and tools
*Familiarity with Unity3D and/or Rails a big plus
*Use of AWS technologies, including EC2, CodeDeploy, and S3, a plus
*Experience building, deploying, and maintaining iOS and Android apps a plus

Working at BrainCheck:
*Join a vibrant team, collaborating to pioneer cognitive health
*Early-stage startup with significant upside potential
*Headquartered at TMCX+ â€“ home to dozens of the most innovative startups and innovation labs in the healthcare industry
*We work hard but like to have fun, including happy-hours, ping-pong and other games
*Competitive compensation consisting of cash and equity

More about the Company
BrainCheck takes gold-standard neurocognitive tests and turns them into mobile interactive games, providing a snapshot of an individualâ€™s cognitive health in about 10 minutes. Our current market offering, BrainCheck Sport, assesses cognitive deficits associated with concussion in sports and athletics, and we also have a direct to consumer version available for iPad and iPhone. Our newly released BrainCheck Memory assesses cognitive and memory impairment associated with dementia, and we are developing a generalized cognitive health tracking tool for the healthy population. BrainCheck has reinvented the process of cognitive assessment to be faster, less expensive, and as reliable as conventional methods.

BrainCheck was developed at the Eagleman Neuroscience Laboratory at Baylor College of Medicine. Dr. David Eagleman has done groundbreaking work on neurocognitive assessment, and he is also a public educator, authoring New York Times bestselling books and appearing regularly on television (most recently PBSâ€™s series The Brain with David Eagleman). David is joined by CEO, Dr. Yael Katz, neuroscientist and technology executive, and a team of ten outstanding individuals in product, software development, clinical research, marketing, business development, and sales.

No agencies / recruiters, please

items.title: Cvedia PTE. LTD.: Generalist 3D Artist with experience in unity3d
items.content:
Generalist 3D Artist with experience in unity3d

Posted Nov 7

Cvedia PTE. LTD.
Headquarters: Spain
syncity.com

We are developing a Unity desktop application to simulate environments for autonomous vehicles. We are looking for experienced 3D Artists, we will value experience with:

  • Experience in unity3d

  • Experience editing and exporting from max or maya to unity (using fbx)

  • Experience working with unity materials and shaders

We offer:

  • Young Funded Start -Up company with Clients and endless opportunities In the most interesting and practical Industry of the Future.

  • Challenging and interesting long term project

  • Remote position

  • Full Time  position

Please mention the job title and the country you live in.

Please send your CV to: jobs@cvedia.com

Check out our projects:

https://syncity.com

https://cvedia.com

Apply for this position

Send a resume to: jobs@cvedia.com
